org.opendaylight.controller.configuration

Interface IConfigurationAwareCommon

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IConfigurationAware, IConfigurationContainerAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationAwareTest, ConfigurationContainerAwareTest, ContainerConfigurationService, ContainerManager, ForwardingRulesManager, NeutronFirewallInterface, NeutronFirewallPolicyInterface, NeutronFirewallRuleInterface, NeutronFloatingIPInterface, NeutronLoadBalancerHealthMonitorInterface, NeutronLoadBalancerInterface, NeutronLoadBalancerListenerInterface, NeutronLoadBalancerPoolInterface, NeutronLoadBalancerPoolMemberInterface, NeutronNetworkInterface, NeutronPortInterface, NeutronRouterInterface, NeutronSecurityGroupInterface, NeutronSecurityRuleInterface, NeutronSubnetInterface, StaticRoutingImplementation, SwitchManager, Topology, TopologyManagerImpl, UserManager

    public interface IConfigurationAwareCommon
    Listener Interface for receiving Configuration events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status saveConfiguration()
      Trigger from Configuration Service or Container Configuration Service to persist the configuration state for this component on the local cluster node

    • Method Detail

      • saveConfiguration

        Status saveConfiguration()
        Trigger from Configuration Service or Container Configuration Service to persist the configuration state for this component on the local cluster node
